name: stomp
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. Power is doubled against Pok√©mon that have used minimize since entering the field.
short_effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Stomps the enemy with a big foot. May cause flinching.
